mapper.sql: SELECT card_no, template, card_date, hall_name, hall_location, hall_tel, groom_tel ,bride_tel , member_id, book_no, url FROM card
mapper.insert:
SELECT card_seq.nextVal FROM dual
INSERT INTO card(card_no, template, card_date, hall_name, hall_location, hall_tel, groom_tel ,bride_tel , member_id, book_no, url) VALUES(#{cardNo}, #{template}, TO_DATE(#{cardDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{hallName}, #{hallLocation}, #{hallTel}, #{groomTel}, #{brideTel}, #{memberVO.memberId}, #{photobookVO.bookNo}, #{url})
mapper.update: UPDATE card SET template=#{template} , hall_name=#{hallName}, hall_location=#{hallLocation}, hall_tel=#{hallTel}, groom_tel=#{groomTel}, bride_tel=#{brideTel}, book_no=#{photobookVO.bookNo}, url = #{url} WHERE card_no = #{cardNo} AND member_id = #{memberVO.memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cardcomment(content,guest, write_date ,card_no, password) VALUES(#{content}, #{guest}, sysdate, #{cardVO.cardNo},#{password})
mapper.select: SELECT guest, password, content, write_date, card_no FROM cardcomment
